name: Order Up (JamesWilson404)
description:
Order Up is a cooking crafting game where your vision is not always clear. Attempt to make burgers whilst the evil tabloids try to dethrone your position. Fight your way through difficult critics and rising rent prices. Unlock challenging recipes and serve difficult customers. The ever-looming darkness, The Ministry Of Food, keeps its cards close to its chest. Will they be your downfall?

Controls

Left Click: Drag Items and Ingredients

Right Click: Interact with Ingredients On Particular Stations

To win you must assemble the orders and drag both the burgers and the order ticket to the top right. Good Luck
